name: The Medieval Psychologist
storyline:
Bernard, a newcomer to Lostworth, begins to offer help to people with problems. His fame soon spreads through word of mouth. Meanwhile, Bernard is drawn into a web of strange events that begin to unfold with the disappearance of a child.
In an effort to uncover the truth, Bernard will also have to confront some facts about himself.
summary: You are a stranger in Lostworth, full of people lost in the darkness of the Middle Ages. Your purpose; helping people spiritually. For this, you only have books, potions, spells and your words. In this adventure, you will face the truth about yourself as you uncover the secrets of the city.
